mapper.select: SELECT id, title, description, validity, restaurant_id as restaurantId, is_active as active, created_at as createdAt, discount_type as discountType, discount_value as discountValue, min_order_amount as minOrderAmount, valid_from as validFrom, valid_to as validTo, usage_limit as usageLimit, per_user_limit as perUserLimit, usage_count as usageCount FROM coupons WHERE restaurant_id = #{restaurantId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupons ( title, description, validity, restaurant_id, is_active, created_at, discount_type, discount_value, min_order_amount, valid_from, valid_to, usage_limit, per_user_limit, usage_count ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{validity}, #{restaurantId}, true, NOW(), #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, #{minOrderAmount}, #{validFrom}, #{validTo}, #{usageLimit}, #{perUserLimit}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE coupons SET title = #{title}, description = #{description}, validity = #{validity}, discount_type = #{discountType}, discount_value = #{discountValue}, min_order_amount = #{minOrderAmount}, valid_from = #{validFrom}, valid_to = #{validTo}, usage_limit = #{usageLimit}, per_user_limit = #{perUserLimit} WHERE id = #{id}
